heading: HR00742
0: A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON TRANSPORTATION TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION ON THE DELAYS OF THE DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION IN ACCREDITING NEW SMOKE EMISSION TESTING CENTERS FOR MOTOR VEHICLES WHICH RESULTS IN  DELAYS IN THE RENEWAL OF REGISTRATION OF MOTOR VEHICLES AND ON THE LAND TRANSPORTATION OFFICE IN CONTINUOUSLY CHARGING PENALTIES AND SURCHARGES FOR LATE REGISTRATION EVEN IF NOT THE FAULT OF THE VEHICLE OWNER
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2020-03-03
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00742
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON TRANSPORTATION TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION ON THE DELAYS OF THE DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION IN ACCREDITING NEW SMOKE EMISSION TESTING CENTERS FOR MOTOR VEHICLES WHICH RESULTS IN DELAYS IN THE RENEWAL OF REGISTRATION OF MOTOR VEHICLES AND ON THE LAND TRANSPORTATION OFFICE IN CONTINUOUSLY CHARGING PENALTIES AND SURCHARGES FOR LATE REGISTRATION EVEN IF NOT THE FAULT OF THE VEHICLE OWNER
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : RODRIGUEZ, RUFUS B.
DATE FILED : 2020-02-26
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON RULES ON 2020-03-03
